item.title: Imperial’s Surcharge on Plant-based Milks
item.author: Tamara Fernandez,
item.description: While many green enthusiasts celebrated the rise in Imperial’s coffee cup levy from 15p to 25p this September, there has been a new surcharge that has gone relatively unannounced. Behold the new, sneaky little 30p surcharge on plant-based milks which has been introduced across Imperial food outlets. …
